trans-unit.source: Creates a tooltip anywhere on the screen.

seg-source.mrk: Creates a tooltip anywhere on the screen.

target.mrk: Creates a tooltip anywhere on the screen.

trans-unit.source: Parameters
The text of the tooltip. (An empty string clears a displaying tooltip)

seg-source.mrk: (An empty string clears a displaying tooltip)

target.mrk: (An empty string clears a displaying tooltip)

trans-unit.source: [optional] The x position of the tooltip.

seg-source.mrk: The x position of the tooltip.

target.mrk: The x position of the tooltip.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The y position of the tooltip.

seg-source.mrk: The y position of the tooltip.

target.mrk: The y position of the tooltip.

trans-unit.source: [optional] The title for the tooltip.
[optional] Pre-defined icon to show next to the title: Requires a title.

seg-source.mrk: Pre-defined icon to show next to the title:

target.mrk: Pre-defined icon to show next to the title:

trans-unit.source: $TIP_NOICON (0) = No icon
$TIP_INFOICON (1) = Info icon
$TIP_WARNINGICON (2) = Warning icon
$TIP_ERRORICON (3) = Error Icon
Constants are defined in "AutoItConstants.au3".
[optional] Sets different options for how the tooltip will be displayed (Can be added together):

seg-source.mrk: Sets different options for how the tooltip will be displayed (Can be added together):

target.mrk: Sets different options for how the tooltip will be displayed (Can be added together):

trans-unit.source: $TIP_BALLOON (1) = Display as Balloon Tip
$TIP_CENTER (2) = Center the tip at the x,y coordinates instead of using them for the upper left corner.

seg-source.mrk: $TIP_CENTER (2) = Center the tip at the x,y coordinates instead of using them for the upper left corner.

target.mrk: $TIP_CENTER (2) = Center the tip at the x,y coordinates instead of using them for the upper left corner.

trans-unit.source: $TIP_FORCEVISIBLE (4) = Force the tooltip to always be visible confining it to monitor borders if necessary. If multiple monitors are used, then the tooltip will "snap-to" the nearest monitor.

seg-source.mrk: $TIP_FORCEVISIBLE (4) = Force the tooltip to always be visible confining it to monitor borders if necessary.
If multiple monitors are used, then the tooltip will "snap-to" the nearest monitor.

target.mrk: $TIP_FORCEVISIBLE (4) = Force the tooltip to always be visible confining it to monitor borders if necessary.
If multiple monitors are used, then the tooltip will "snap-to" the nearest monitor.

trans-unit.source: Constants are defined in "AutoItConstants.au3".
Return Value
0 when title length is greater than 99.

seg-source.mrk: 0 when title length is greater than 99.

target.mrk: 0 when title length is greater than 99.

trans-unit.source: Remarks
To skip an optional parameter, leaving its default value intact, use the Default keyword.

seg-source.mrk: To skip an optional parameter, leaving its default value intact, use the Default keyword.

target.mrk: To skip an optional parameter, leaving its default value intact, use the Default keyword.

trans-unit.source: If the x and y coordinates are omitted, the tip is placed near the mouse cursor.

seg-source.mrk: If the x and y coordinates are omitted, the tip is placed near the mouse cursor.

target.mrk: If the x and y coordinates are omitted, the tip is placed near the mouse cursor.

trans-unit.source: A Tooltip will appear until the script terminates or ToolTip("") is called.

seg-source.mrk: A Tooltip will appear until the script terminates or ToolTip("") is called.

target.mrk: A Tooltip will appear until the script terminates or ToolTip("") is called.

trans-unit.source: You may use @CR or @LF to create multi-line tooltips.

seg-source.mrk: You may use @CR or @LF to create multi-line tooltips.

target.mrk: You may use @CR or @LF to create multi-line tooltips.

trans-unit.source: To display an icon, you must specify a non-empty title. The icon appears on the same row as the title and thus requires a title to be present.

seg-source.mrk: To display an icon, you must specify a non-empty title.
The icon appears on the same row as the title and thus requires a title to be present.

target.mrk: To display an icon, you must specify a non-empty title.
The icon appears on the same row as the title and thus requires a title to be present.

trans-unit.source: If using the center flag, the center of the tooltip will be at the coordinates specified. If using the center flag with a Balloon Tip, the stem will be centered on the balloon and will point to the coordinates specified.

seg-source.mrk: If using the center flag, the center of the tooltip will be at the coordinates specified.
If using the center flag with a Balloon Tip, the stem will be centered on the balloon and will point to the coordinates specified.

target.mrk: If using the center flag, the center of the tooltip will be at the coordinates specified.
If using the center flag with a Balloon Tip, the stem will be centered on the balloon and will point to the coordinates specified.

trans-unit.source: Related
Example
This will create a tooltip in the upper left of the screen

seg-source.mrk: This will create a tooltip in the upper left of the screen

target.mrk: This will create a tooltip in the upper left of the screen

trans-unit.source: This is a tooltip
Sleep to give tooltip time to display
